ModMetaData.name: Death Rattle - Comatose
ModMetaData.author: Proximo
ModMetaData.description:
This addon to Death Rattle contains new featurs and compatibelity patches for Death Rattle. It requires the installation of Death Rattle as base and extends/changes some functionality as documented below.
Created for: - Death Rattle ( https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1552452572 )
Changes: - nothing right now
Patches: - Compatibelity patch to "Questionable Ethics" ( https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1541064151 )
Featurs: - Japanese translation(by Proxyer) - Spanish / SpanishLatin translation (by Pollo frito) - "Artificial coma" surgery (5 medicine). Will induce a unlimited comatose state that gets "worse" over time (10 days until death). But it will slow down all negativ effects of DeathRattle. Induced early it can double the time you have to get a new organ. To wakeup a pawn you need to use the drug "Wake-Up". Artificial coma will not work on pawns with current Wake-Up-High. Warning: Starting at severity 0.7 (after 7 days) the comatose state will gratually lead to brain damage and vegetativ state.
TODO-List (not implemented yet!): - Liverfailure "severityPerDayNotImmune" changed from 3 to 1. (Aims to be behave more like kidneys, just that you don't have 2 of them.) - ClinicalDeathNoHeartbeat "SevereBrainDamage" changed now needs minSeverity of 0.26 (clinical death) (gives some more seconds to react to this development) - ClinicalDeathAsphyxiation "BrainDamage" changed now needs minSeverity of 0.26 (clinical death) (gives some more seconds to react to this development)
If you are missing a feature or compatibelity of Death Rattle, leave a comment.
